mapper.update: update worknumber set schoolID=#{schoolID}, brief=#{brief}, name=#{name}, background=#{background}, createBy=#{createBy}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select , hdImage.id as 'hdImage.id', hdImage.version as 'hdImage.version',hdImage.datestr as 'hdImage.datestr',hdImage.path as 'hdImage.path',hdImage.name as 'hdImage.name',hdImage.title as 'hdImage.title',hdImage.type as 'hdImage.type',hdImage.refID as 'hdImage.refID' from worknumber w left join attachment hdImage on hdImage.id = w.headImage where w.id = #{id} and w.isDeleted = false

mapper.select: SELECT FROM workmanager workmanager RIGHT JOIN worknumber w ON w.`id` = workmanager.`workID` left join attachment bgImage on w.background = bgImage.id left join attachment hdImage on w.headImage = hdImage.id WHERE w.`id` = #{condition.id} AND workmanager.`userID` = #{condition.userID}

select , hdImage.id as 'hdImage.id', hdImage.version as 'hdImage.version',hdImage.datestr as 'hdImage.datestr',hdImage.path as 'hdImage.path',hdImage.name as 'hdImage.name',hdImage.title as 'hdImage.title',hdImage.type as 'hdImage.type',hdImage.refID as 'hdImage.refID' from attention a RIGHT join worknumber w on a.workID = w.id left join attachment hdImage on hdImage.id = w.headImage where a.concernID = #{condition.concernID} ${orderByClause}
select from workmanager m RIGHT join worknumber w on m.workID = w.id where m.userID = #{condition.userID} ${orderByClause}

select w.id as workID,count(DISTINCT a.id) as fans,count(DISTINCT wp.id) as position from worknumber w left join attention a on w.id = a.workID left join workposition wp on wp.workID = w.id and wp.`status`= 2 group by w.id

select p.personPhoneNumber , m.workID from workmanager m left join personalauthen p on m.userID = p.userID UNION select p1.personPhoneNumber,'admin' as 'workID' from txadmin t left join personalauthen p1 on t.userID = p1.userID
